alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 1:34AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Periods of dense fog early this morning... Current Webcams and surface observations across far southeast Wyoming and the southwestern Nebraska Panhandle show widespread fog with some locally dense fog with visibilities between one eighth to one half mile. This fog is not expected to lift until after sunrise Wednesday and will likely spread further west towards the Interstate 25 corridor over the next few hours. Motorists are urged to slow down and use low beam headlights while traveling across southeast Wyoming and the southern Nebraska Panhandle this morning. Visibilities around one quarter of a mile are possible at times. Please allow extra travel time to reach your destination.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
